welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bossier City, where Southern charm meets modern allure! Get ready to experience our vibrant culture, mouthwatering cuisine, and exciting entertainment. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shreveport Downtown Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Shreveport Downtown Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shreveport Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Shreveport Regional Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for unlimited use.
